title: Anatomy Formatting Schema
description: Defines formatting rules for anatomy descriptions including part order, pluralization, and descriptor formatting

$schema.description: Optional. A URI reference to the schema for editor support.

id.description: Unique identifier for this formatting configuration

descriptionOrder.description: Order in which body part types appear in descriptions

groupedParts.description: Body part types that should be grouped together in descriptions

pairedParts.description: Body part types that use 'a pair of' when there are two

irregularPlurals.description: Mapping of body part types to their irregular plural forms

noArticleParts.description: Body part types that should not have articles (a/an) in descriptions

descriptorOrder.description: Order in which descriptor component types appear in descriptions

commaSeparatedDescriptors.description: Descriptor types that use commas instead of hyphens for separation

descriptorValueKeys.description: Keys to search for when extracting descriptor values from components

mergeStrategy.description: Optional merge strategy configuration for when multiple mods define formatting

replaceArrays.description: If true, arrays are replaced entirely instead of merged

replaceObjects.description: If true, objects are replaced entirely instead of merged
